body_html:
Awesome!

Quick overview Q: I see the Avro C library is still part of this commit, is this intentional? Like is the idea to point configure to this internal copy of the library? I would prefer not to check it in I think, but you've probably thought about this more than I have.

body:
Awesome!

Quick overview Q: I see the Avro C library is still part of this commit, is this intentional? Like is the idea to point configure to this internal copy of the library? I would prefer not to check it in I think, but you've probably thought about this more than I have.
